articles.description: From the C-suite to middle management and the call center, no professional function is safe from AI's influence.
articles.content: A recent report by Goldman Sachs estimates that approximately 300 million global jobs could be exposed to automation, and one-fourth of all work could be replaced by generative artificial intelligenc… [+5238 chars]
